CustomField.formula: IF( AND(Legacy_CPO__c =false,ISPICKVAL(ERP__c,'P20'),ISPICKVAL(Apttus_Config2__Status__c,'Ready for Execution'), ISPICKVAL( Contract_Type_Name__c,'Project')),HYPERLINK('/apex/Apttus_XApps__EditInExcelLaunch?selectedRecordId='+Id+'&appName=SO Export&mode=touchless&outputType=None', IMAGE("/resource/SO_Export","SO Export"),"_self"),null)
CustomField.label: SO Export
